title: Hymn 1 Mutsvene, Mutsvene
lyrics:
1. Mutsvene, Mutsvene,
     Mwari weMasimba.
     Mangwana, mangwana toimba
     kwauri
     Mutsvene, Mutsvene wetsitsi, namasimba
     Mwari wengoni Mwari,
     Mutsvene


2. Mutsvene, Mutsvene!
     vanokurumbidza,
     Vanhu vako vose kunewe
     kudenga
     Ingirozi dzose pachigaro
     chako
     Dzinopfugama mberi kwauri.


3. Mutsvene, Mutsvene, vanhu
     verima
     Vanhu vakaipa havakuoni.
     Uri woga Mutsvene: hapasisina
     mumwe;
     Una masimba nezvirokazvo


4. Mutsvene,Mutsvene,Mwari
     wemasimba.
     Anokurumbidza abasa ako
     ose
     Mutsvene, Mutsvene, wetsitsi
     namasimba
     Mwari wengoni, Mwari Mutsvene.

title: Hymn 2 Kudzai Mambo
lyrics:
1. Kudzai Mambo ano utsvene
     Ari kudenga ana masimba;
     Ndiye nhoo yedu yakare kare
     Chigare chake chakakurumbidzwa.


2. Imbai masimba nengoni dzake;
     Ari kudenga nenguo chena
     Hasha dzake dzose dzinotinhira.
     Anofamba zvake pachamupupuri.


3. Ana masimba wakaisika,
     Nyika nezvinhu zvose zvirimo;
     Wakaitsigira nemurairo,
     Wakaikombera nemvura yose


4.Kufudza kwako kusingarehwi;
    Kuri pamhepo napakupenya.
    Kuri pamakomo napamakan’a,
    Kuri pane mvura napane dova.


5. Isu vaduku hatine simba,
    Tinotarira chete kwauri;
    Tsitsi dzako dzose dzisingaperi.
    Hama yakanaka nomununuri.


6. Una masimba norudo rwose:
     Dzinoimbira dzose kudenga
     Nesuwo venyika tinoimbira.
     Tinokurumbidza kusingaperi.

title: Hymn 3 Imi Mose Muri Pasi
lyrics:
1. Imi mose muri pasi
     Imbai kuna Jehovha
     Kurumbidzai mumutende
     Uyai norufaro kwaari.


2. Tinoziva kuti Jehovha
     Ndiye Mwari wechokwadi;
     Tiri vara rehwai dzake,
     Anotipa kudya kwedu


3. Pindai suo guru rake;
     Muswedere kuna Mambo;
     Simudzai manzwi enyu,
     Makafanira kudaro.


4. Ndiye Mwari akanaka,
     Tsitsi dzake dzakakomba
     Rudo nechokwadi chake
     Hachingatipindi isu.

title: Hymn 4 Mwari Uri Zuva Redu
lyrics:
1. Mwari uri zuva redu,
     Unopenya pauzuru;
     Asi Mweya ungaone
     Paunozofamba napo


2. Mwari uri nhoo yedu,
     Hatidzitye hondo dzedu.
     Dzose dzinokundwa newe,
     Tigouya nokufara.


3. Unotipa ngoni dzako,
     Unotipa noutsvene.
     Unopa vanonamata,
     Unopa Rukomborero.


4. Rukomborero rukuru
     Rukomborero rwedenga,
     Ruripo rwavanofunga,
     Kuti vanodiswa newe.

title: Hymn 5 Kudza Jehova Mwari
Hymn 6 Ngatimukudze Mwari
lyrics:
Ngatimukudze Mwari,
     Nemwoyo unofara;
     Tsitsi dzake ihuru
     Dzinoitirwa isu.


2. Anoraira zuva.
     Rivhenekere nyika;
     Tsitsi dzake ihuru,
     Dzinoitirwa isu.


3. Zvinhu zvose zvipenyu,
     Zvinoponiswa naye.
     Tsitsi dzake ihuru,
     Dzinoitirwa isu


4. Anotikwanisawo
     Anoda kukumbirwa:
     Tsitsi dzake ihuru,
     Dzinoitirwa isu.


5. Kana tiri panhamo
     Tinochengetwa isu.
     Tsitsi dzake ihuru,
     Dzinoitirwa isu.


6. Mwana wake wakafa,
     Kuti tipinde denga.
     Tsitsi dzake ihuru,
     Dzinoitirwa isu.


7. Ngatimukudze Mwari,
     Nemwoyo unofara.
     Tsitsi dzake ihuru,
     Dzinoitirwa isu.

title: Hymn 7 Mukudzei Iye Mwari
lyrics:
1. Mukudzei iye Mwari,
     Navari kudenga;
     Mukudzei iye Mwari.
     Navari kudenga.


2. Imi muri nhume dzake,
     Mukudzei iye;
     Nemi muri hondo dzake,
     Mukudzei iye.


3. Iwe zuva newe mwedzi,
     Mukudzei iye.
     Nemiwo imi nyenyedzi,
     Mukudzei iye.


4. Iwe mwoto, newe chando,
     Mukudzei iye;
     Iwe chando, newe bvute,
     Mukudzei iye.


5. Newe mhepo inovhuvhuta
     Chimukudza iye;
     Newe ita izwi rake,
     Paunozonzwika.


6. Imi muri vaShe mose,
     Mukudzei iye.
     Nemi imi vanhu mose,
     Mukudzei iye.


7. Nemi vanhu machembera,
     Mukudzei iye.
     Nemi mhuri yose,
     Mukudzei iye.

title: Hymn 8 Jehova Una Masimba
lyrics:
1. Jehovha una masimba,
     Zvose zvakasikwa newe,
     Uri Ishe wavo vose,
     Ivo vari pakudenga.


2. Jehovha uno ruzivo,
     Unoziva zvose zvinhu,
     Isu vanhu hatizivi,
     Isu tose hatigoni.


3. Jehovha wakarurama,
     Naiyo mirahu yako.
     Isu nyamba tapfuura,
     Tine mhosva mberi kwako.


4. Jehovha muri Mutsvene.
     Takaipa mberi kwako.
     Isu ngatimukumbire,
     Rwose ruregerero rwake.


5. Jehovha unadzo ngoni,
     Wotibata nadzo tose;
     Wakauya Mwana wake,
     Kuponisa vanhu vose.

title: Hymn 9 Ngatitende kuJehova
lyrics:
1. Ngatitende kuJehovha,
     Kuti wakanaka.
     Kuti dzose ngoni dzake,
     Hadzizonopera.


2. Ngavadaro Israeri,
     Imba dzavo dzose.
     Kuti dzose ngoni dzake,
     Hadzizonopera.


3. Takashevedza Jehovha,
     Tanga tamanikwa;
     Wakazotiisa iye,
     Kunzvimbo yo’fadza.


4. Kana Ishe wakatida,
     Hatigoni kutya;
     Angamuka angadiiko,
     Munhu’yu kwatiri?


5. Izvo Ishe wakatida,
     Anotiyamura;
     Atiyamure zvikuru,
     Kuvavengi vedu.


6. Kuvimba naiye Ishe,
     Nokunzvenga naye;
     Ndizvo zvakanakanaka,
     Kusavimba vanhu.


7. Ngatipone newe Ishe,
     Utiropafadze;
     Tizorore newe Ishe,
     Utiropafadze;
     Undiropafadze.

title: Hymn 10 Wakasika Zvose Zvinhu
lyrics:
1. Wakasika zvose zvinhu,
     Iwe Mwari woga.
     Pasina wakuyamura;
     Kuzviita kwako.


2. Aya makomo amire.
     Akasikwa newe;
     Akasimira,
     Takapiwa newe.


3. Wakasika vanhu iwe,
     Nokufana newe;
     Ukavapa zvinhu zvose,
     Zvakakodzera.


4. KwasVika muvengi wavo,
     Akavabvutira;
     Vakusiya iwe Mwari,
     Vakanzwa izwi rake.


5. Wati kuvaponisa,
     Ukaita tsitsi;
     Ukavapa Mwana wako,
     Akazovafira.


6. Wakati kuvaponisa,
     Ukaita tsitsi;
     Ukavapa mwana wako
     Achizovafira.

title: Hymn 11 Ndinoshamiswa Kwazvo
lyrics:
1. Ndinoshamiswa kwazvo,
     Namabasa makuru;
     Akaitiwa newe,
     Ose anorumbidza,
     Ukuru hwako Mwari,
     Hunoshamisa kwazvo.


2. Kana ndarangarira
     mabasa okudenga,
     Kana ndarangarira
     mabsa apanyika,
     Inobuda misodzi,
     Kana ndafunga iwe.


3. Mwari vatatu, mumwe,
     Ita kuti tikude;
     Nokuti wakatida,
     Wakazotipa Jesu,
     Wakatipa Mweya wako,
     Wokutipupurira.


4. Rumbidza iwe denga!
     Rumbidza iwe nyika,
     Rumbidza iwe nguva!
     Nesu ngatirumbidze
     Uyu Musiki wedu,
     Unorudo rukuru.
